participant_1.background:
I have a crib made of sustainable materials in my baby's nursery.
I like the weather to be a bit cooler so I can enjoy my late night walks and football games.
I just fed my dog.
I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast.
I am close to my parents, but we are not very similar.

participant_2.background:
I met my family through a series of awkward encounters and shared experiences.
i didn t go to college because i run the family farm.
madonna is my sister.
I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
i can draw.

content.text: Hi, I'm a parent of a new baby. How are you?
Hi there! I'm doing well. I'm Madonna's sister.
Really? That's so cool! I've always admired her.
Thanks! She's an amazing person. I'm also a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
That's great! I'm a big fan of Jimmy Fallon too. Do you watch any other shows?
I love The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon, The Late Show with Stephen Colbert, and SNL.
Me too! I also watch The Office and Friends.
Those are great shows! I've never seen The Office, but I've heard good things about it.
You should check it out. It's a really funny show.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw, paint, and play video games.
That's great! I like to draw and paint too.
That's awesome! What kind of things do you like to draw?
I like to draw animals and landscapes.
Those are great subjects! I like to draw people and animals.
That's cool! I've never been able to draw people well.
